articles.title: Britain’s trains disrupted in second widespread strike in a week
articles.description: The walkout is the second industrial action since another 40,000 workers staged a nationwide strike on Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pope calls treatment of Indigenous in Canada schools ‘genocide’
articles.description: Pope Francis steps up his apology, saying the technical word for the wiping away of a people’s culture was ‘genocide’.
articles.content:
